const addValue = (e,st,ch,gr,setGr) => { e.preventDefault() let index = document.getElementById("input1").value index = parseInt(index,10) const value = document.getElementById("input2").value const myStruc = (st.find(e => e.id === ch).tile) //array of coordinates const newGrid = gr.slice() const myIndex = myStruc[index] const i0 = myIndex[0] const i1 = myIndex[1] const tile = newGrid[i0][i1] const newTile= { ...tile, text:`${value}` } newGrid[i0][i1] = newTile setGr(newGrid) } const arrOp =
see items
export default {arrOp}
